original: You dare to disturb my eternal research, now you must perish by my wrath!
string: 你竟敢打扰我永恒的研究，现在你必将在我的怒火中毁灭！

original: Use me to destroy this lesser creature, my Lord!
string: 用我来摧毁这个低等生物，吾主！

original: Your existence is not worthy of a single note in the archives of Apocrypha!
string: 你的存在，根本没资格在异典的档案中留下片纸只字！

original: The mind of an illiterate implodes in the face of the forbidden knowledge!
string: 在禁忌知识面前，无知者的心智只会瞬间崩溃！

original: My Master's eyes are everywhere and his mind knows everything... There is no escape for you!
string: 吾主的慧眼无处不在，其思绪通晓万物……你无处可逃！

original: Soon you will be a hollow shell in the halls of Apocrypha, wandering aimlessly through eternity...
string: 很快，你就会变成一具空洞的躯壳，在异典的殿堂里永世漫无目的地游荡……

original: No sword, shield or incantation can stand against my arcane mastery!
string: 无论是刀剑，盾牌还是咒语，都无法与我的奥术造诣相抗衡！

original: No desires, no passions, no fears, no joys, only knowledge matters!
string: 没有欲望，没有激情，没有恐惧，没有喜悦，唯有知识才是一切！

original: Endless libraries of unread mysteries await me once you're dropped dead.
string: 等你一死，那藏着无数未解之谜的浩瀚书库就将向我敞开。
